name: Spirit of Midnight
description:
Gameplay takes cues from classic point-and-click adventure games, but without being excessively difficult or complicated. Sit back, interact, and be entertained. Controller play recommended.

Play as a house cat who, after encountering a strange spirit, sets off on a mystery-solving adventure over the course of a single night. Meet other unusually intelligent (and adorable) forest creatures, some of whom join you on your quest for answers!
